p: Finally, there are a pair of studies showing high seropositivity against H9N2 in Nigerian poultry and agricultural workers, however, no virus has been isolated from this country [ 57, 58]. Although surveillance for HPAIVs is ongoing in Nigeria, it is unclear whether protocols are used that would pick up the presence (or absence) of H9N2 viruses, therefore it remains unclear whether the virus is/was present in this region.
